title: (x) GQ logo - custom designed {Mark S}
content:
Can anyone tell me what typeface GQ use for their logo?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gq\_cover[1].jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228160619/http:/typophile.com/files/gq_cover%5B1%5D.jpg) | 198.8 KB |
author: dendicott

comments.content:
Ack! I don't think so. You're joking, I hope.

It's similar to Avant Garde Gothic, but bolder, and the Q is more like Futura's. In any case, I'm pretty sure it's custom, not a font.
